Initializer# init(backgroundColor:enablePostProcessing:layerInstructions:requiredSourceSampleDataTrackIDs:timeRange:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+

```
init(
    backgroundColor: CGColor? = nil,
    enablePostProcessing: Bool = true,
    layerInstructions: [AVVideoCompositionLayerInstruction] = [],
    requiredSourceSampleDataTrackIDs: [CMPersistentTrackID] = [],
    timeRange: CMTimeRange = .zero
)
```
